document_data.name: Dirbert
document_data.mainbody: '''Dirbert''' was a young man who lived in [[Imnesvale (town)|Imnesvale]] during the midâ€“14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Personality: Dirbert was rather naive and impetuous, and did not thoroughly think through his actions. Likes his peers, Dirbert wanted to become a daring [[adventurer]].
document_data.Relationships: Dirbert was friends with Imnesvale's other youths, namely [[Neler]] and [[Valsben]].
document_data.History: In the {{YearlinkName|1368}}, Dirbert and his friends went around town looking for anyone that would buy them some [[bastard sword]]s and a keg of ''[[De'Tranion]]'s [[Baalor ale]]'', so they could begin their adventuring career in earnest.
